channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: US imposes sanctions on El Chapo’s fugitive sons, offers $10 million reward for their capture
item.description: The U.S. imposed sanctions on the two fugitive sons of incarcerated Mexican Sinaloa Cartel leader Joaquin “El Chapo” Guzman and announced a reward offer of up to $10 million each for information leading to the arrest or conviction of the sons.

item.title: California governor plans to file lawsuit against Trump over National Guard deployment to protests
After tear gas and street fires, a Los Angeles community cleans up as National Guard troops arrive
